name: INSPACE 2980
description: INSPACE 2980 is a stylish and dynamic SHMUP from the 16-bit era of games consoles and arcade machines. Take part in an exciting adventure and save the galaxy! Once again!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHZ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or AMD graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
